Reviews.Title: “Sleepless night”
Reviews.Author: Tom F
Reviews.Content: wife stayed night january 23 2012 500 mile road trip falling asleep 1030pm heard sound diesel truck engines outside window soon heard mechanical noises crews shouting outside found desert communications boom trucks cell tower 20 feet building crew supposed sleep anytime finished midnight instead continued night shouting truck engines boom noises outside complained loudly bad motel manager credit free nights stay thanks shame desert communications ruining stay motel 6 manager desert contacts motel 6 starting night recommend stay cell tower removed

HotelInfo.Name: Motel 6 Phoenix West
HotelInfo.Address: 1530 N 52nd Dr, Phoenix, AZ 85043
